Description: model type of the Interbotix Locobot such as 'locobot_base' or 'locobot_wx250s'
name of the robot (could be anything but defaults to 'locobot')
if true, the RPLidar node is launched
set to true if the lidar is installed on the robot; this will load the lidar related links to the 'robot_description' parameter
if true, Rtabmap opens in localization only mode; if false, Rtabmap open in SLAM mode

arguments that should be passed to the rtabmap node; note that these arguments are in addition to the arguments already specified in the rtabmap_default_args argument in the `xslocobot_nav.launch`_ file
whether or not to use Rtabmap's Visualization tool; it's not really necessary as Rtabmap already has RViz display plugins
arguments to pass to the Rtabmapviz visualization node
location where all the mapping data Rtabmap collects should be stored
desired angle [rad] that the D435 camera should be tilted when doing SLAM or localization
true if the xslocobot_control.launch file should be launched - set to false if you would like to run your own version of this file separately
